subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The middle finger on Devils center Travis Zajac’s left hand had been stitched and was wrapped with tape late Friday. Such an injury among hockey players is common, but the cause of this one was highly unusual.
snippet: The middle finger on Devils center Travis Zajac’s left hand had been stitched and was wrapped with tape late Friday. Such an injury among hockey players is common, but the cause of this one was highly unusual.
